</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Control fireplace burning. Set inflame to [[true]] (on) or [[false]] (off).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> fireplace '''inflame''' burn

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> fireplace: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> burn: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_fireplaceOne [[inflame]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[inflamed]]
</value></part></template>
